text: Reginald Ottrey Williams (1914–2012)Trove was Archdeacon of Rangiora from 1968 until 1979.Anglican Life He was educated at the University of New Zealand and ordained in 1941. After a curacy at Addington he was Priest in charge of Westland. He then held incumbencies at Lincoln, Addington and LinwoodWord Press before his appointment as archdeacon.Crockford's Clerical Directory 1980–82 p 1107: Oxford, OUP, 1983 He died on 31 July 2012.Heaven Address ==References== Category:University of New Zealand alumni Category:2012 deaths Category:Archdeacons of Rangiora Category:1914 births
title: Reg Williams (priest)
